and life cycle management at the end of the day it's a rules engine it's a rules engine for how you want to manage your
data so what you can do with life cycle management is that you can set a rule that essentially deletes or cleans out
objects at the end of the month it can set a rule that says I'm going to um
take all the former versions of my uh object and move it into Glacier earlier
in the year we introduced a new feature where we combined versioning with life cycle management so we released

they came back to us and they said you know I'm kind of spending a little bit of money on this because I got different versions I got pay for different
versions but they really wanted to keep those versions around because what happened if somebody accidentally
deleted objects in a bucket we don't you know this this could happen for all kinds of different
reasons but when it happens customers were like what am I going to do then so they turn on versioning but they don't
like the cost so one thing that we did is we turned on uh we integrated life cycle management and versioning so what
you can do is you can only keep the last version of an object in your bucket you
can tear out you can tear out either through deleting or you can tear out to Glacier other versions minimizing the
